mod.name: Autoblaster
mod.ability: During ship combat, turn up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Hit]. If you have Tactics, you may instead turn 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Crit].

mod.name: Ion Cannon
mod.ability: During ship combat, cancel 1 of your opponent's [Hit]. If you have Tactics, you may instead cancel 1 [Crit].

mod.name: Maneuvering Thrusters
mod.ability:
Gain +1 [Hull].
During ship combat, if you have Tactics, your opponent rolls 1 fewer die.

mod.name: Targeting Computer
mod.ability: Once per ship combat, you may reroll any number of your blank dice.

gear.name: Jetpack
gear.ability: During ground combat, cancel 1 of your opponent's [Hit]. If you have Tactics, you may instead cancel 1 [Crit].

gear.name: IQA-11 Blaster Rifle
gear.ability:
Gain +1 [Ground Combat Value].
When you win a ground combat, you suffer a maximum of 2 damage.

gear.name: Plastoid Armor
gear.ability: Gain +2 [Health]. During ground combat, if you have Strength, your opponent rolls 1 fewer die. Limit 1 ARMOR per character.

gear.name: Vibro-Ax
gear.ability:
Gain +1 [Ground Combat Value].
During ground combat, if you have Strength, you may turn 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Crit].

gear.name: Vibroknife
gear.ability:
During ground combat, you may turn 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit].
If you have Stealth or Strength, gain +1[Ground Combat Value].
